item.title: Another slight prob lol =]
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

Just use:
[scar]procedure stealing;
begin
repeat
mmouse(random(515),random(335),20,20)
FindColorSpiral(x,y,chestcolor, 1, 1, 515, 336);
MMouse(x,y,3,3);
until Option2(‘hest’);
mouse(x+random(2),y+random(2),3+random(2),3+random(2),false);
wait(200)
ClickOption(‘earch’,1);
end;[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Another slight prob lol =]
item.dc:creator: @fooktard fooktard
item.description:
@fooktard wrote:

ok so ive been working on my nat stealer. ive got it to right click and select search for traps over and over, that works perfect, but the problem is sometimes it right clicks and misses the chest and gets stuck on the box saying “Walk here”
Cancel

so i wrote some code to select “cancel” if "search for traps isnt present. However it dusnt work i get the error… “Line 18: [Error] (14468:28): ‘THEN’ expected in script C:\Documents and Settings\Compaq_Owner\Desktop\startofnats.scar”

here is the stealing from the chest code if someone could help me…

procedure stealing; begin repeat FindColorSpiral(x,y,chestcolor, 1, 1, 515, 336); MMouse(x,y,3,3); until Option2('hest'); mouse(x+random(2),y+random(2),3+random(2),3+random(2),false); wait(200) ClickOption('earch',1);if not(ClickOption('earch',1));THEN ClickOption('ancel',1); until end;

Please someone help

fooktard.

Read full topic
